frame.name: Renunciation
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> declares that they will no longer be involved with the <fen>Content</fen>. Such a declaration implies that the <fen>Speaker</fen> has decided that association with the <fen>Content</fen> is somehow undesirable.
<ex>That will only be possible if and when <fex name="spe">the IRA</fex> <t>renounces</t> <fex name="con">armed struggle</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Speaker
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates their cessation of association with the <fen>Content</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Addressee
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Addressee</fen> is the person to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> is communicating. When this FE is expressed, it often appears in a prepositional phrase introduced by "to", or as a direct object. </def-root>

FE.name: Content
FE.definition:
<def-root>The idea that the <fen>Speaker</fen> no longer associates with, whether it be an activity, a propostion, or a group.
<ex>Bonnie Charlie then <t>renounced</t> <fex name="con">his aspirations to the throne</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the renunciation which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Speaker</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
<ex>Your government then <fex name="man">coldly and completely</fex> <t>renounced</t> you.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>An act whereby the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes a statement of renunciation. </def-root>

FE.name: Internal_cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>The emotional or physical state of the <fen>Speaker</fen> that leads to their renunciation.
<ex>That 's when he finally <t>renounced</t> their friendship <fex name="int">in despair</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement of renunciation.
<ex>Castro <t>renounced</t> all involvement with the group <fex name="med">over the radio</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state of the <fen>Speaker</fen> during the statement.
</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the statement is made.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The FE specifies the place where the statement takes place. </def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: renounce.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: formally declare one's abandonment of (a claim, right, or possession).
